attributes.action: To force a re-vote on the NHS pay rise 2018 following misleading information
attributes.background: In the NHS pay rise vote of 2018, Staff were given false and misleading information. The voting system used meant many staff were not given or missed the opportunity to vote. The Electoral Reform Service should be used to conduct a proper and lawful ballot of all affected members of NHS staff

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the Government or Parliament have the power to do. This would be the responsibility of the unions. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228019
